title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Volunteer
body: Volunteer        Current Volunteer Opportunities    Â       General Information For more information about volunteer opportunities at Theodore Roosevelt National Park please contact Eileen Andes at (701) 623-4730 x 1411. The Student Conservation Association (SCA) recruits and places high school and college students, and individuals already out of school, into volunteer positions within federal, state, and local government agencies as well as private nonprofit agencies and organizations. Boy Scouts and Girl Scouts can volunteer in the park and earn a special patch. Learn more about Boy Scout and Girl Scout Rangers.
